bach.types¶

Functions for looking up the right classes to handle types and values, and for registering new custom types.

To prevent cyclic imports, the functions in this file should not be used by dataframe.py before the file is fully initialized (that is, only use within functions).

Functions

get_dtype_from_db_dtype(db_dtype)

Given a database datatype, return the dtype of the Series subclass for that datatype.

get_series_type_from_db_dtype(db_dtype)

Given a database datatype, return the correct Series subclass.

get_series_type_from_dtype(dtype)

Given a dtype, return the correct Series subclass.

register_dtype([value_types, ...])

Decorator to register a Series subclass as dtype series :value_types: List of Types for which values should be instantiated as the registered class :override_registerd_types: If False an Exception is raised if the class' dtype or db_dtype conflict with existing registerd types or if one of the value_types are already coupled. If True this new registration will override the existing one.

value_to_dtype(value)

Give the dtype, as a string of the given value.

Classes

TypeRegistry()

class bach.types.TypeRegistry[source]¶
get_series_type_from_db_dtype(db_dtype: str) → Type[Series][source]¶

Given a db_dtype string, will return the correct Series object to represent such data from the database..

get_series_type_from_dtype(dtype: Union[Type, str]) → Type[Series][source]¶

Given a dtype string, will return the correct Series object to represent such data.

register_dtype_series(series_type: Type[Series], value_types: List[Type], override_registered_types: bool = False)[source]¶

Add a Series sub-class to this registry. Will register the given series_type as the default type for its dtype and db_dtype

value_to_dtype(value: Any) → str[source]¶

Given a python value, return the dtype string of the Series that’s registered as the default for the type of value.

bach.types.get_dtype_from_db_dtype(db_dtype: str) → str[source]¶

Given a database datatype, return the dtype of the Series subclass for that datatype.

bach.types.get_series_type_from_db_dtype(db_dtype: str) → Type[Series][source]¶

Given a database datatype, return the correct Series subclass.

bach.types.get_series_type_from_dtype(dtype: Union[Type, str]) → Type[Series][source]¶

Given a dtype, return the correct Series subclass.

bach.types.register_dtype(value_types: Optional[List[Type]] = None, override_registered_types: bool = False)[source]¶

Decorator to register a Series subclass as dtype series :value_types: List of Types for which values should be instantiated as the registered class :override_registerd_types: If False an Exception is raised if the class’ dtype or db_dtype conflict

with existing registerd types or if one of the value_types are already coupled. If True this new registration will override the existing one.

bach.types.value_to_dtype(value: Any) → str[source]¶

Give the dtype, as a string of the given value.
